titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses woolen sales and financial matters in detail. It is reported that although Bussora [Basra] is quiet, a Persian force was defeated near Coorna (where Shakih Yamar of the Montifick has around 20,000 men encamped). Other political developments from Persia are also reported including an alleged revolt by Zackey Cahn [Zaki Khan].
